messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] divorce,links
messages.msgSnippet: Here are links for  a single parent homeschooling list that I m on: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SingleParentHSing
messages.messageBody:
Here are links for a single parent homeschooling list that I'm on:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SingleParentHSing
http://www.singleparenthomeschooling.f2s.com

It's been pretty quiet lately, but if you wanted to join and wake
everyone up, that would be great. The members are a mixture of divorced,
divorcing, and never-married homeschooling parents...

Daron

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] divorce,links
messages.msgSnippet: I tried it and couldnt find it either, I did however find quite a few lists for this subject. http://momsingles-subscribe@yahoogroups.com Description
messages.messageBody:
I tried it and couldnt find it either, I did however find quite a few lists
for this subject.
http://momsingles-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Description Category: Divorce
Many of you asked for Momslove to have a singles forum, well, here it is.
Please no husband bashing(ok to complain a little) but let's focus on what
helps singles get through tough times and fun times.


http://divorcechatfamily-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Description Category: Divorce
Delightful group of people


Description Category: Divorce
this is for anyone who has small children like me and who need to talk with
someone
http://divorced-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

I found 90 of these, you could browse some of them if you havent already:)
Indiana Tami
